answers.answer: I am finding neem soap really renews skin, smoothing it and lightening discolored parts.If, however, this is dark creases on the inside, it may be related to diabetes.

question: I have rough and black knees and elbows. I can't wear tanks or shorts and skirts. Its embarassing. How do I remove these? I've tried using lemon but it never works. What can I do?
title: Rough and Black Knees and Elbows
